name: Child
briefDescription: CHILD is a non-profit organization, registered as a trust in the year 2005(Reg. No â€“ 658/2005). For the past ten years, we have successfully given home care to a limited number of orphans and abandoned children of HIV positive parents, unwed Mother & destitute children. We provide these children a home environment, so that their complete need for Education, Safety, and Physical/Mental Health are satiated. All staffs are well trained and certified by local authorities from the Social Welfare Board of Chennai. Today, we have 22 lovely children, who live good life and with no doubt will grow up to be exceptional global citizens.
